main event: A UFO was observed on radar moving from south to north over the Atlantic Ocean.
interesting points: The UFO appeared as a bright light on the GCI radarscope., It lasted approximately 30 seconds., Two minutes later, a faded yellowish object followed the same track., There are conclusions drawn that it may have been a weather balloon or an aircraft., The report indicates clear weather conditions during the sighting.
sighted object: bright light and a faded yellowish object
